statements: UPDATE PhylogeneticData SET common_ancestor = 'Hominoidea' WHERE species_id = 1;

UPDATE PhylogeneticData SET common_ancestor = 'Homo sapiens' WHERE species_name = 'Homo erectus'

UPDATE species SET family='Canidae', kingdom='Animalia' WHERE species_id=1;
UPDATE evolutionary_relationships SET relationship_type='Sibling' WHERE species_id1=2 AND species_id2=3;
UPDATE species SET kingdom = 'Animalia', family = 'Felidae' WHERE species_id = 1

UPDATE Species SET common_name = 'Dog' WHERE species_name = 'Canis lupus'
UPDATE Genus SET family_name = 'Canidae' WHERE genus_name = 'Canis'
UPDATE Species SET common_name = 'Dog', classification = 'Mammal' WHERE species_id = '213b0718-1fbe-4296-a3f3-1d578db8c36c';
UPDATE Family SET order_name = 'Carnivora' WHERE family_name = 'Canidae';

UPDATE genus SET family_id = 2, genus_name = 'Tiger' WHERE genus_id = 3;
UPDATE species SET species_name='Tiger' WHERE species_id=1;
UPDATE phylogeny SET ancestor_id=5 WHERE species_id=3;

UPDATE Species SET name = 'Bald Eagle', scientific_name = 'Haliaeetus leucocephalus', kingdom = 'Animalia', phylum = 'Chordata', class = 'Aves', family = 'Accipitridae', genus = 'Haliaeetus' WHERE id = 1;
